engineered_features.name: charges_per_service
engineered_features.business_logic: Monthly charges divided by number of services. Lower = better value perception.
engineered_features.validation: Churners pay €10.35 more per service on average
engineered_features.impact: High - clear separation between churners and retained

engineered_features.name: is_month_to_month
engineered_features.business_logic: 1 if customer on month-to-month contract, 0 if locked in
engineered_features.validation: Month-to-month customers have 15x higher churn rate
engineered_features.impact: Very High - strongest predictor from EDA

engineered_features.name: lifecycle_stage
engineered_features.business_logic: Customer maturity based on tenure: New/Growing/Mature/Loyal
engineered_features.validation: New customers have 5x higher churn than Loyal
engineered_features.impact: Medium-High - needed for GenAI strategy generation
engineered_features.note: High correlation with tenure (0.961) - keeping for downstream use
